sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Reports
sect1.para: This page shows information about the deployed BPEL processes on this server.

simplelist.member: Click to filter the instances list.
Click to clear Reports Search criteria form. This will go to the page showing information of the instances for the uploaded BPEL processes on this server.

To view the current status of an instance click the value on the Instance ID's row in the listing. This will go to a separate page showing the state of each activity of the instance, including variable values, partner links etc.

To view the process info page click the name of the process on the Process name's row in the listing. This will go to a separate page showing the state of each activity of the instance, including variable values, partner links etc.
Click to navigate among the list of processes.

sect3.title: Process name
sect3.para: When specified, the list of values for the field Version will be the versions of the specified process.

sect3.title: Version
sect3.para: This is the list of versions for the specified process. It is disabled when no process is specified.

sect3.title: Instance State
sect3.para: This is the list of the instance states.

sect3.title: Time
sect3.para: This is the list for the instance when it is started and when it is finished.

sect3.title: Order by Instance
sect3.para: When specified, the result will be order by the choosen value.
